captions.text: The track is very complicated.

Even the most experienced
say it's serious.
The track is good for falls.
At the finish I crawled, aside the track.
Didn't get back on the track.
At the first race start we were second.

Quickly became the first,
but at the last lap,

right before the finish,
the chain fell off and stuck.

We couldn't continue the race,
couldn't get the chain back.

At the hope race, before the last lap
the chain fell off again,

but fortunately didn't
get jammed so bad.

We pulled it back, placed it right
and made it to finish second.

To win at the finals,
a very good skier is needed.
It all depends on a skier on this route.

I think, now the smartest
will win, because of ice.

Need to find places to get through.
In this ride everyone had to fall.
Everyone.
I don't know how the skier could hold on.

We went trampolines full speed,
jumping each of them.

The best were here.
But we won, finally!

After all, with a first place
at the big final –
Oskars Dzirkalis and Didzis Gorbenko!
Yeah!

title: Ski Racing Behind Motorcycles - Red Bull Twitch 'n' Ride 2015

comments.text: can I snowboard this?﻿
comments.author: Alex Bowen

comments.text:
Соревнования Red Bull Twitch 'n' Ride 2015

Скийоринг — разновидность зимнего вида спорта, в котором лыжника буксирует 
лошадь, собака (собаки) или моторизованное транспортное средство (в 
частности мотоцикл). Компания Red Bull на своем официальном канале 
опубликовала видеоролик с соревнований «Red Bull Twitch 'n' Ride», которые 
ежегодно проводятся в городе Цесис, Латвия.

В большинстве своем скийоринг напоминает помесь лыжных гонок с мотокроссом, 
поскольку комбинируются прыжки с крутыми поворотами.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=itEcDxBg_bA﻿
comments.author: Блаутер

comments.text:
The Red Bull Twitch’n‘Ride event is a skijoring competition where they use 
motorbikes to pull a skier around a course. ﻿

comments.author: Duy Tuong Ho (H D T)

comments.author: The Bike Washer

comments.text:
I think I'm going to have a word about this. 1st - I'm a skier of this shit 
and I was racing into this race. It's hard as hell, exhausting.
Risk is high, ropes are long & strong and they're not elastic. Injury risk 
due to falling off the skis/bike also is very high.  Speed - up to 60mph. 
Jumps - up to 5m/15ft. You have to be a bit insane to do this, but it is 
AWESOME. Red Bull Twitch N Ride actually is the crown jewel of the season, 
other races are organized on flat fields without jumps. Altough this is 
hardest race in the season, I would (and I will) do it agin next year. 
Cheers!﻿

comments.author: HAILEY van SCHAIK

comments.text:
Ropes are personal preference of the skier. Only limitation is max length - 
6m. You can use any rope comfortable for you, natural, synthetic, round, 
flat whatever ;) It depends on the comfort of skier and ease to operate 
with rope, because rules say's that you must collect rope in the corner and 
not allow it to lay on snow ;)

+Reinis Tilaks .I don't think cycle soccer is dangerous, just kinda 
silly.....I've seen it all at the race track and this rope racing is

comments.author: TheHypnotstCollector

comments.text:
+TheHypnotstCollector  Soccer with motorcycles also happens here. We do not 
find this dangerous. Also the jumps shown here are only in Red Bull, in 
normal Skijoring races there are no jumps, just FYI. You just have not 
participated in a race and dont know how it really is! I am a skier, skiing 
behind my father and I know how "dangerous" this is. My little brothers, 
who are 12 and 11 both participate and nothing bad has happened!
comments.author: Reinis Tilaks

comments.text:
+Reinis Tilaks   after going to supercross/motocross races for over 20 
years and letting my son race  since he was 9,  I say, this stuff is 
dangerous... (Remember when the Russians did the 1980 Olympics and 
introduced the world to soccer with motorcycles?)
comments.author: TheHypnotstCollector
